label: table
description: name of this table

label: path
description: path to the TSV file for this table, relative to the table.tsv file

label: type
description: type of this table, used for tables with special meanings

label: description
description: a description of this table

label: table
description: the table that this column belongs to

label: column
description: the name of this column

label: label
description: the label of this column

label: nulltype
description: the datatype for NULL values in this column

label: datatype
description: the datatype for this column

label: structure
description: schema information for this column

label: description
description: a description of this column

label: datatype
description: the name of this datatype

label: parent
description: the parent datatype

label: condition
description: the method for testing the datatype

label: description
description: a description of this datatype

label: SQL type
description: the SQLite type for representing this data

label: HTML type
description: the HTML type for viewing and editing this data

label: studyName
description: the name of the study

label: Sample Number
description: the sample identifier

label: Species
description: the species of the measured individual

label: Region
description: the region where the measurement took place

label: Island
description: the island where the measurement took place

label: Stage
description: the growth stage of the individual

label: Individual ID
description: the ID of the measured individual

label: Clutch Completion
description: whether the measured individual's clutch of eggs was complete

label: Date Egg
description: the date that an egg in the clutch was observed

label: Culmen Length (mm)
description: the length of the culmen of the individual, in millimetres

label: Culmen Depth (mm)
description: the depth of the culmen of the individual, in millimetres

label: Flipper Length (mm)
description: the length of the individual's flipper, in millimetres

label: Body Mass (g)
description: the body mass of the individual, in grams

label: Sex
description: the sex of the individual

label: Delta 15 N (o/oo)
description: the Delta 15 N measurement

label: Delta 13 C (o/oo)
description: the Delta 13 C measurement

label: Comments
description: comments on the measurement or the individual
